bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.description:
Transferred from http://code.opencv.org/issues/2909 || Richard Signell on 2013-03-22 14:23 || Priority: Normal || Affected: 2.4.4 || Category: python bindings || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: None || PR: || Platform: None / None samples/python2/asift.py --crashes on windows Running samples/python2/asift.py 
python asift.py --feature=sift
causes python to crash on my windows machine other types (e.g. "surf") work okay. See attached screen grab. History Richard Signell on 2013-03-22 14:25 Adding the forgotten screen grab. - File 3-22-2013_10-19-41_AM.png added Daniil Osokin on 2013-03-23 06:34 Richard, thank you for attention! Richard Signell on 2013-04-06 13:35 Still broken in 2.4.5. Do I need to post elsewhere?

comments.comment: works on latest master - it does not crash so this can be closed <denchmark-code>... using sift affine sampling: 43 / 43 affine sampling: 43 / 43 img1 - 59199 features, img2 - 41370 features matching ... 89801.95 ms 32 / 121 inliers/matched </denchmark-code>
